author: Daniel Dale, Tara Subramaniam, Marshall Cohen and Holmes Lybrand, CNN
title: Fact-check: Trump says some states aren't in jeopardy from the virus, denies saying it would go away by April
description: President Donald Trump made yet another series of inaccurate or misleading claims at a coronavirus briefing on Friday.
content:
Washington (CNN)President Donald Trump made yet another series of inaccurate or misleading claims at a coronavirus briefing on Friday.
He incorrectly asserted that some states are not in jeopardy from the virus, incorrectly suggested that his February claims… [+11234 chars]
